content: अह् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> or {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> = अंह् <ab>q. v.</ab> {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> To sing together, compose, celebrate, prepare. {vIII.v} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (अह्नोति, आहीत्, आह) To pervade. {vIV.v} (a defective verb preserved only in five forms आत्थ, आहथुः, आह, आहतुः, आहुः) {@--1@} To say, speak, mention. {@--2@} To acknowledge, accept, state. {@--3@} To declare, express, signify. {@--4@} To hold, consider, regard. {@--5@} To call.
